scripts.cov: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web coverage run manage.py test
scripts.cov_rep: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web coverage report
scripts.lint: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm web pylint authorization frontend news
scripts.fixture: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web python manage.py loaddata news
scripts.flush: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web python manage.py flush --no-input
scripts.build: webpack --mode production ./project/frontend/src/index.js --output ./project/frontend/static/frontend/main.js && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec web python manage.py collectstatic
